verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}In Your presense I will dwell, in the shelter of You the Most High In You I will abide In Your Presense I will sing, You are faithful the God who covers me With love and mercy{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}You are my refuge, You are my fortress And I will trust You In times of trouble, still You are with me And I will trust You, and I will trust You{/lang-eng}
